程序包 org.bukkit.block.data.type

接口 Stairs

所有超级接口:
Bisected, BlockData, Cloneable, Directional, Waterlogged
public interface Stairs extends Bisected, Directional, Waterlogged
'shape' 值代表阶梯方块的材质和碰撞箱的类型.
